InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

Item Type: Shield Generator

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

This military-grade component has been put through the paces by the UEE Navy, so you know the Maelstrom can handle the havoc of battle.

InstalledItem.Name: Arctic
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Providing the kind of durability that made Aegis products a mainstay with the military, the Arctic is an economic mil-spec cooler capable of withstanding the rigors of combat without sacrificing performance.

InstalledItem.Name: Arctic

InstalledItem.Name: Crossfield
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Wei-Tek has marketed the Crossfield specifically to target military personnel and veteran pilots who will appreciate the stats that the mil-spec quantum drive offers.

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.
